review: I eagerly awaited the arrival of my Fire Stick!  Unfortunately, after I completed the set up, it stopped working. After talking to 3 helpful techs on-line, it was determined to be a malfunctioning devise. Stick 2 arrived after 4 days. Also defective. I'm done with this and will probably buy Roku.
author: Nancy M. Sweet

review: Great device. I was fed up with my $150+ DirecTV bill, so I took the plunge and canceled cable TV. I use this device with the HULU app and pretty much watch all of the same television shows I watched on Cable with my HULU subscription. I am by no means an avid television viewer, so for me, this was a great change and I felt pretty much no difference going from DirecTV with a Genie DVR, to the Amazon Fire TV. Prime movies are great for movies and the HULU app on this device is EXCELLENT for the Cable TV Experience.
